channel.title: Prayer Updating
channel.description:
I'm trying to create a formula for updating your prayer level once you level it up. For example:
If you have 30/33 prayer and you level your prayer up to 34, I want it to change your current prayer to 31/34, which increases the current prayer level to how many levels you gained. Any help?

item.title: Prayer Updating
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

[quote=“Krim, post:3, topic:452390”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=555269.msg4065387#msg4065387 date=1343841330]
playerLevel[prayer] += 1
[/quote]
That only takes the level and increases it by 1. I’m wanting it to take that level and increase it by how many levels you leveled up. For example, say if someone levels up two levels, not just one.[/quote]

Have a look at how potions increase your stats if it’s added in your source.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer Updating
item.dc:creator: @Krim Krim
item.description:
@Krim wrote:

asshole_rule:

playerLevel[prayer] += 1

That only takes the level and increases it by 1. I’m wanting it to take that level and increase it by how many levels you leveled up. For example, say if someone levels up two levels, not just one.

Read full topic
